channel.title: Need help to recover from hang over!
channel.description: I am in work guys and i am severly hung over and if my boss catches me lyin on table again he said he not payin me for today lol so i need recover urgent

item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“dannytuite, post:12, topic:44825”]Suck my dick u wee turd talkin out u whole i fuckin asked for a quick cure but you come off wit some balls your 8 ffs wise up m8…[quote author=goatee link=topic=62213.msg744645#msg744645 date=1168142803]
No danny.

He’s prolly 8 and has never seen alcohol… who the hell goes to work and type like that.
[/quote] here u must not drink then lol or u have wee sips of wine or cherry at the end of the weeek ahahahah dick[/quote]

You can sip cherries? I’ll have to try that some time! Maybe thats how you got drunk! If so yo must be hammered! Gonna last for weeks with those cherries in your system!
